A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I give it a 3 at best and I'm probably going to wait for the final episode to come out on DVD or stream it. WEAK story\, diluted among too many plot lines and absurd Deus ex Machina incidents. Character development is non existent. Sure the FX are strong\, but so what? It's astonishing how the elite reviewers' taste is soo divergent from the audience's.
